text: Robert Dudley is the name of: ==Surname== *Robert Dudley (actor) (1869–1955), American dentist and film character actor *Robert Dudley (explorer) (1574–1649), illegitimate son of the 1st Earl of Leicester *Robert Charles Dudley (1826–1909) watercolours and lithographs *Bob Dudley (born 1954), former president & CEO of TNK-BP (2003–08) and group CEO of BP (2010–20) *Robert Dudley, 1st Earl of Leicester (1532–1588), favourite of Queen Elizabeth I of England *Robert Dudley alias Sutton (died 1539), MP *Robert H. Dudley (born 1933), Justice of the Arkansas Supreme Court ==Middle name== *Robert Dudley Baxter (1827–1875), English economist *Robert Dudley Edwards (1909–1988), Irish historian
title: Robert Dudley
